title: Daily Maintenance - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: The following maintenance tasks should be performed daily: Make sure every service is running Check CPU/Disk/RAM/Network usage - spot trends: declining, growing, flat Ensure there is enough disk space Ensure there is no SWAP being used Ensure that daily backups have been taken
